Game and crack work 100% on alienware m11x r1. 

it really is quite simple you just have to be smarter then the computer guyz. 

#1 make sure your pc has what it takes to play this game, at least a dual core and a good graphics card ( nividia, redeon...etc)

#2 install game by mounting the first iso disk using magic disc or other virtual disc drive and run the autorun.exe file should automatically pop up after mounting, if not browse the disc for the autorun.

#3 when it asks for disc 2. open magic disc and mount the 2nd iso image to the same drive the last one was mounted in. the game should automagicly continue to install if not hit continue.

#4 after the game finishes installing. open the blacksite area 51 program folder located in (C:programfiles(x86)/midway/blacksite area 51). now drag and drop the blacksite.exe located in the download folder to the program folder and hit move and replace.

to make it easier to get to right click on the blacksite.exe after transferring it to the program folder and add a shortcut to the desk top.  


if you get a please insert disc message you didnt transfer the cracked exe.

if you get a missing dwix. whatever its called your trying to run the cracked exe from a location other then the program files. the crack has to be in there or it wont work.
